title: Setup Development Tools and Environment
description: Configure development tools including linters, formatters, and development server settings

user_stories: As a frontend developer, I want properly configured development tools so that I can write consistent code
As a team lead, I need standardized linting and formatting so that code quality is maintained
business_rules: ESLint must be configured with TypeScript and Angular rules
Prettier must be configured for code formatting
Development server must support hot reloading
Environment variables must be properly configured
edge_cases: Handling different linting rules for different file types
Ensuring consistent code formatting across the team

acceptance_criteria: ESLint is configured with TypeScript and Angular rules
Prettier is configured for code formatting
Code formatting and linting work correctly

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular best practices for development tool configuration. Ensure consistent code quality standards across the team.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure environment variables are properly secured and not exposed in client-side code
